episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A form that a full grown Jr. Lioner takes. It can be found in the Garden of Yellow in Orbis, and this mature Lioner charges all of its lightning attribute, using the horn on its head to attack. This monster is highly resistant to attacks of lightning attribute. Let's try defeating the Lioner using attacks of ice attribute.

name: Grupin
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A form that a full grown Jr. Grupin takes. It can be found in the Garden of Green in Orbis, and this mature Grupin, which changes from purple to green, charges all of its cold air attribute, using its horn on its head to attack. This monster is highly resistant to attacks of cold air attribute. Let's try defeating the Grupin monster using attacks of fire attribute.

name: Hogul
drops: Scroll for Two-handed BW for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A tiger found near the Korean Folk Town. This seems to be what a full-grown Hodori would become. Unlike the threatening firm-build it sports, it is rather cautious when approaching the adventurers. It used to be intrepid until Ludibrium was turned upside down due to the Temporal Schism.

name: Bellflower Root
episode:
Form : Plant

A plant that closely resembles a ginseng, although its medicinal effects fall way below. A group of Bellflower Roots keep intruding the ginseng field and absorbing all of the nutrients in the soil, which upsets Mr. Ku of the Herb Town. The Bellflower Roots discovered Mr. Ku's ginseng field when they were looking for a new habitat since the abduction of their prince, Wu Yang. Seeing how they've gotten pretty comfortable in the field, it is suspected and assumed that the Bellflower Roots will continue to be a pain in Mr. Ku's neck for a while longer.

name: MT-09
drops: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for Accuracy 60%
episode:
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Sanctity Attribute Attacks Repellent.

A powerful weapon secretly built by the Mateon aliens to attack the earth. It has been built to support the small and weak Mateons, and it is equipped with multiple explosive missiles. The Omega Sector has sent over a special troop to battle against MT-09.

name: Sr. Bellflower Root
episode:
Form : Plant

A plant that closely resembles a ginseng. Although Bellflower Roots have been said to fall way below in medicinal effects compared to ginseng, this Sr. Bellflower Root can be even more effective than ginseng at times. It may look weak and weary, making you feel guilty about hunting this monster, but take advantage of its use as medicinal herb. After all, it's only a Bellflower Root.

name: Roid
drops: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for Accuracy 60%
notes: Seems to share the same episode lore as Neo Huroid? Locations tab is currently a mess, displaying over four pages of "Critical Error" which was the name of the mini dungeon that is removed on Fantasia.
episode:
Form : Enchanted

A robot built by alchemists in Magatia. It is small but has the power that will exceed your expectation, and also has an extremely intricate internal structure.

name: Malady
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

Monsters that have turned evil due to the magic of darkness they have inherited from the demons. They are experimenting the forbidden magic, and can be seen riding their flying brooms around the deep forest to gather materials for their experiment. They are vulnerable to attacks of sanctity attribute.

name: Stone Golem
episode:
Form : Enchanted

A stone monster that's been enchanted by a forest spirit. It is the protector of the forest from which it was born, and will never launch an attack at an adventurer without provocation. But if you've indiscriminately entered into the forest without permission, you may be at the mercy of the Stone Golem's punch so be careful.

name: Hector
drops: Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for Accuracy 100%
episode:
Form : Mammal

A monster that appears in the form of a wolf near El Nath. It is a popular target amongst the hunters who are after its thick coat, which facilitates the Hector's survival in the cold weather of El Nath. When attacked, Hectors attack using magic of multiplicity, so it is highly encouraged that you quickly step back when you find yourself in a dangerous encounter with this monster.

name: The Book Ghost
drops: The Book Ghost's Sheet of Paper
Scroll for Two-handed BW for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Spirit

A precious documentation that reveals the principles of nature and universe written by an ascetic of the olden times. The Book Ghost was brought to life by a mysterious force originating from the profound truth and the ascetic's magic embodied in the book. Some say that becoming an adept in this book can grant one power and strength, but the Book Ghost will attack anyone who is not qualified to be its mater.

name: Dark Jr. Yeti
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A yeti often spotted in the canyons far away from El Nath. They say that the Dark Jr. Yeti is the evil form of the good Jr. Yeti. It is much faster than the Jr. Yeti and is more advanced in terms of attack powers, defense strength, etc.. It is also made of completely different attributes which makes it particularly vulnerable to forces of Sanctity.

name: Samiho
drops: Scroll for Staff for Magic Att. 60%
Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
notes: Inflicts curse (lowered exp debuff)
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A Three-Tailed Fox that can be found near the Korean Folk Town. It is striving to become a Nine-Tailed Fox, but only has three tails as it is still in the process of training. It has taken over an entire valley of the Black Mountain, practicing magic by casting a curse on the passersby; hence, the adventurers exploring the Fox Ridge should always remain alert and cautious.

name: Grizzly
drops: Scroll for Staff for Magic Att. 60%
Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 100%
Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
episode:
Form : Mammal

A type of bear that lives near Mu Lung. Although it's only a bear, it has a heartfelt desire to become a virtuous master, hence devoting much of its energy in training. While it diligently trains in its practice uniform, it sometimes fails to suppress its animalistic instinct and attacks the passersby.

name: Skeleton Soldier
drops: Scroll for Staff for Magic Att. 60%
Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
Scroll for One-Handed BW for Accuracy 100%
episode:
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

The skeleton of a soldier that was brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. It once was a Sharenian guard, but died during the fall of the Sharenian empire and was revived without a soul.

name: Coolie Zombie
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 100%
episode:
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

Undead monsters that can be found in the Forest of Dead Trees in El Nath. When Riche's tomb formed the Forest of Dead Trees, the trees in the forest bewitched lifeless beings, turning them into zombies. Because the Coolie Zombies became zombies to protect the forest against their will, they possess nothing but hostility and hatred towards humans. These monsters, who walk with a severe limp, are the followers of Riche and are extremely dangerous as they orally emit potent poison.

name: Miner Zombie
episode:
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

Undead monsters that can be found in the Forest of Dead Trees in El Nath. When Riche's tomb formed the Forest of Dead Trees, the trees in the forest bewitched lifeless beings, turning them into zombies. Whether it was due to an accident in the mine or simply a mutation, but the Miner Zombies have a severe limp and a nearly blind eye on one side.

name: Dark Stone Golem
drops: Scroll for Two-handed BW for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A Stone Golem monster which had been infected with an evil aura that had permeated throughout the depths of the forest, leaving the forest in ruins and annihilating the Stone Golems that were guarding the Stone Golem's Temple. The Dark Stone Golems who had inadvertently caused a detrimental effect on the Temple decided to finish their duties by going into Sleepywood. But it is said that some Dark Stone Golems frequently appear in the Golems' Temple.

name: White Fang
drops: Scroll for Two-Handed BW for Accuracy 10%
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a wolf near El Nath. It is a popular target amongst the hunters who are after its thick coat, which facilitates the White Fang's survival in the cold weather of El Nath. However, its white fur blends in with the surroundings, making this monster more difficult for the hunters to spot than a Hector, not to mention its high attack rate and resistance to attacks of ice attribute.

name: Reindeer
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for STR 10%
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A deer that feeds on peaches at the Peach Farm. Due to the effects of its diet, the Reindeer boasts high intelligence which allows it the luxury to use powerful magic. There is a rumor that a Reindeer's antler in perfect condition without any breakage can enhance one's ascetical powers, but it is extremely difficult to acquire an antler from a Reindeer without breaking it off.

name: Neo Huroid
drops: Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for Accuracy 10%
notes: Seems to share the same episode lore as Roid?
episode:
Form : Enchanted

A robot built by alchemists in Magatia. It is small but has the power that will exceed your expectation, and also has an extremely intricate internal structure.

name: Mixed Golem
episode:
Form : Enchanted

The remaining fragments of Stone Golems and Dark Stone Golems have formed this mutation, which possesses the characteristics of both golems; hence, it has even higher attack rate than regular golems. It can be found in dungeons as well as the deserted Golem's Temple, guarding the temple even after its rebirth.

name: Red Drake
notes: Only found at Dangerous Valley II in Perion.
episode:
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dragon that lives in mountainous desert highlands. Is from a very weak and unintelligent breed of dragons as compared to regular dragons of that family of monsters. The Red Drake used to have its nest set in Sleepywood, but was banished by the other dragons due to its weaknesses. It has since been training in the desert highlands, adjusting to the heat of the sun and practicing launching powerful fireballs into a far distance. There aren't very many adventurers who'll be able to hunt this thick-coated, fireball-throwing dragon known as Red Drake.

name: Pepe
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that is occasionally found in the snowfield far from El Nath. It wears a golden crown, and can move with finesse even on ice as it has quickly adapted the surroundings of icy snowfield. Now, it can move faster in snowfield than any other monsters, so you should always be on the lookout should this monster begin to attack. Its dashing speed and subsequent attack render Pepe a difficult monster to avoid. Only found in snowfields, Pepes have a very close relationship with the Yetis, which explains why Yetis are occasionally found with a Pepe mounted on their heads, although no one has discovered how this phenomenon was started.

name: Morphed Blin
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 60%
notes: Locations tab is empty for this monster.
episode:
Form : Devil

A blue goblin fire that appears in the Black Mountain. It floats in the air and scares the passersby. When the goblin fire is attacked, the Morphed Blin reveals its true self, which resembles a block of brick. Rather than a type of goblin, it might be more accurate to say this monster is close to an evil spirit that lives in the Black Mountain.

name: Panda
drops: Scroll for One-Handed Axe for Accuracy 60%
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for Accuracy 10%
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A type of bear that lives near Mu Lung. Although it is just a bear, it sincerely desires to become a virtuous master; hence, it is always wearing its training uniform, completely immersed in training. It has features similar to those of humans, but no one knows whether that is because it is close to becoming a virtuous master or because that's just one of this monster's special traits.

name: Nightghost
notes: Notably does NOT drop "Fan" dagger.
episode:
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Holy, Fire, and Ice Attribute Attacks.

A wandering spirit who died full of resentment and thus could not leave the world. Now it wanders around aimlessly at night. It has forgotten all about itself and who it was, and is looking for something unknown in the dark.

name: Water Goblin
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 60%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster commonly called Kappa. Annoyed by humans polluting the river, it has begun to take revenge on humans. It really likes cucumbers above all else, but it also uses cucumbers as weapons when attacking humans.

name: Extra B
episode:
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison and Fire Attribute Attacks.

A street gangster who used to lay bricks in a poor village. Being tight on money, he borrowed money from Flaming Raccoon Finance, but in order to pay off the debt he had to become a subordinate of Flaming Raccoon. The bricks of the Flaming Raccoon’s buildings are also carefully made by him.

name: Extra C
episode:
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison and Fire Attribute Attacks.

This hooligan’s dream as a child was to grow up to be a famous baseball player, but an accident brought him into the dark world. As a result, the bat became a weapon for harming others.

name: Trucker
drops: Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 60%

name: Tippo Red
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD area were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Tippo Red can often be found in the Boat Quay area, and it cannot swims so it steals a bright yellow swimming float with a red pattern and carries it around.

name: Tippo Blue
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The pollutants accumulated in the CBD area were gathered together and brought to life by a hidden force of evil. Tippo Blue can often be found in the Boat Quay area, and it cannot swims so it steals a bright yellow swimming float with a blue pattern and carries it around.

name: Pac Pinky
drops: Scroll for Two-handed BW for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Holy Attribute Attacks.

Pac Pinky is the second lowest ranked of the ghostly sailors aboard the Ghost Ship, charged with the task of fishing for food. It wears a bored expression on its face, and often wanders out further away from the ship and nearer to the quay.

name: Selkie Jr.
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

Selkie Jr. is the third lowest ranked of the ghostly sailors aboard the Ghost Ship, mostly working on the deck. It can be recognized by the big grin on its face, and seemed to have picked up a few tricks with its rope from a cowboy.

name: Gryphon
drops: Scroll for Two-handed Sword for ATT 10%
notes: Drops "Jungle Lily" despite not being listed.
episode:
Form : Mammal

The mighty Gryphon lives on the peaks of the cliffs above the Krakian Jungle. Not much is known about these majestic creatures, other than that they are causing a terrible ruckus for the construction workers of New Leaf City. They swoop in from above and scratch up paintwork, crash into windows and knock over cranes. As a result, Lita Lawless has placed a high price on every Gryphon’s head…

name: Sophilia Doll
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for DEF 60%
notes: Defeating "Sophilia Doll Ground" gives 55 EXP. Drops "Stretchy Material" despite not being listed.
episode:
Form : Enchanted

The decapitated head of a doll resembling Prendergast’s daughter’s favorite doll. These dolls have been produced in immense numbers, and roam the hallways of the Haunted Mansion. Which child could possibly have a use for this many dolls?

name: Voodoo
drops: Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
episode:
Form : Enchanted

A blue doll that seems to have found a purpose as a pincushion…? This rather macabre exercise has left the doll with a haunting appearance. Could this really be the work of a child?

name: Hoodoo
drops: Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
notes: Drops "Duct Tape" despite not being listed.
episode:
Form : Enchanted

A purple doll that seems to have found a purpose as a pincushion…? This rather macabre exercise has left the doll with a haunting appearance. Could this really be the work of a child?

name: Phantom Tree
episode:
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The Crimson Trees are all that remain of the once beloved tres that made up the Crimsonwood Forest. After the war between the Keep and the Krakians, the trees became haunted by the spirits of Krakians who sought refuge in them. By cutting down the trees, and taking their seeds, perhaps one can help cleanse the forest of this terrible curse…?

name: Python
episode:
Form : Reptile

The terrifying Python is the king of the jungle around the Floating Market. Its thick and scaly skin forms a formidable barrier to incoming projectiles. Additionally, much like certain specimen of eel, it has mastered the art of lightning, which is occasionally uses to strike enemies from afar. Only the strongest of adventurers can defeat the Python.

name: Red Slime
notes: Weak to Ice attacks.
episode:
Form : Spirit

Part of the Slime family of monsters, the Red Slimes live in hot and humid underground regions. It is much stronger than the regular Slime, perhaps strengthened by the intense heat of its surroundings, and beginners are thus not recommended to take it on.

name: Buffy
drops: Scroll for Cape for Magic Def. 60%
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for Accuracy 60%
Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
Scroll for Staff for Magic Att. 60%
episode:
Form : Devil

A young spirit of a time stopper who used to work at the Clocktower in Ludibrium in the past. It was mild-tempered before the force of time consumed its spirit. Since then, contrary to what its jester's hat may deceivingly illustrate, it has become hostile and attacks people using the force of entangled time while floating around deep inside the Clocktower.

name: Wild Kargo
drops: Scroll for One-Handed BW for Accuracy 60%
Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
episode:
Form : Reptile

A monster with lots of contending rumors such as the one that claims that the Wild Kargo was once the pet cat of the ancient devil Balrog and the rumor that it was a cat that was left behind by some adventurer while exploring a dungeon. The only that has been confirmed was by one very courageous scholar who went around to get to the truth of this supposed cat and discovered that the Wild Kargo is in fact a reptile, not a cat. Its eyes, however, look so much like a cat's that everyone agrees that more research is required to get to the truth of this monster. It is one of the most powerful monsters that one will meet in Sleepywood.

name: Peach Monkey
drops: Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for Accuracy 60%
Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
episode:
Form : Mammal

A monkey that feeds on peaches at the Peach Farm. The Peach Monkeys have pink coat of fur due to the effects of their diet, but these monkeys rival, if not surpass, the intelligence level of humans. At first, the Peach Monkeys helped spread the seeds to expand the Peach Farm, but because of the gradual growth of their population, they have actually begun to harm the farm.

name: Officer Skeleton
drops: Scroll for Staff for Magic Att. 10%
episode:
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

The skeleton of a Sharenian officer devoid of spirit. After the fall of the Sharenian empire, Ergoth has revived the Skelton with the force of darkness.

name: Soul Teddy
drops: Scroll for Staff for Magic Att. 10%
Scroll for Overall Armor for STR 100%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as the Soul Teddy's source of hatred and subsequent attack.

name: Ice Drake
drops: Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for Accuracy 60%
episode:
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Ice Attribute Attacks Repellent. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A monster dragon that lives deep in the dungeon. When compared to regular family of dragons, the Ice Drake is weaker and has a lower level of intelligence. However, it has acquired an ice attribute while adapting to the coldness of the dungeon, and you can become a block of ice when attacked by this monster. Even its bones are comprised of ice, therefore its attack of ice attribute could inflict a significant damage.

name: Dark Pepe
episode:
Form : Mammal

A penguin monster often spotted in the canyons far away from El Nath. Dark Pepe is a transformed form of Pepe, that's been endowed with evil powers. Is an advanced monster with powerful attacks and defenses, especially compared to its original form as Pepe. One thing that hasn't been changed is the characteristically fast speed of Pepe. Dark Pepe is vulnerable to forces of Sanctity.

name: Mr. Alli
drops: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Reptile

A monster alligator that lives in the swampy regions near the Herb Town. It enjoys the company of small animals, so it is often seen carrying a little bird on its head and a baby Bellflower Root on its back. It does not attack unless provoked, but it turns into a ferocious monster when attacked.

name: Yeti
notes: Transformed Yeti gives 390 EXP.
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A gigantic snowman that appears in the snowfield far from El Nath. Although its speed of movement may seem sluggish, the power it illustrates when forcefully striking its two fists on the ground can inflict significant damage. Due to its thick coat of fur, it manages well in the cold but can't stand heat. This fundamentally mild-natured monster roams around with its close friend Pepe mounted on its back. It is a pet in popular demand, as it is loyal and obedient when raised by a human from a young age.

name: Homun
episode:
Form : Enchanted

It is neither a mammal nor a plant. This strange form of life that was created inside a beaker is muggy gray, perhaps because it was created by a mixture of chemicals. It likes to roam around with a beaker over its head.

name: Lazy Buffy
episode:
Form : Devil

A young spirit of a time stopper who used to work at the Clocktower in Ludibrium in the past. It was mild-tempered before the force of time consumed its spirit. Since then, contrary to what its jester's hat may deceivingly illustrate, it has become hostile and attacks people using the force of entangled time while floating around deep inside the Clocktower. Lazy Buffy is the fiercest of them all, never ceasing to attack the adventurers.

name: Sage Cat
drops: Scroll for One-Handed Axe for Accuracy 100%
Scroll for One-Handed Sword for Accuracy 60%
episode:
Form : Mammal

A cat that somehow got its hands on the book of Toist magic, which now self-proclaims that it is a Sage Cat after having mastered the skills on the book.  Because it did not go through the proper, extensive training of becoming a virtuous master, it is rather antagonistic and violent by nature. You must be careful of this catty monster which has the tendency to scratch its enemy, as it has gained an expertise on powerful magic attacks.

name: Master Soul Teddy
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Ice Attribute Attacks Repellent. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as its source of hatred and subsequent attack. It harbored deepest grievance and resentment than any other teddy bears, hence it was endowed with the most powerful force of damnation.

name: Dark Drake
drops: Scroll for Cape for Magic Def. 60%
Scroll for Cape for Weapon Def. 60%
episode:
Form : Reptile

A dragon monster that lives in the depths of dungeons. Is from a very weak and unintelligent breed of dragons as compared to regular dragons of that family of monsters. The Dark Drake was endowed with an evil force in the cursed Temple and has grown a rather thick skin on its body. Its speed in the dark is uncontested.

name: Dark Yeti
notes: Transformed Dark Yeti gives 445 EXP.
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A gigantic snowman that appears in the snowfield far from El Nath. This mutant Yeti that has been consumed by an evil force is faster, stronger, and superior to the mild-natured Yeti in every aspect; it has also maintained Yeti's signature fists that can inflict major damage, making this monster all the more dangerous. Try attacking this monster using sanctity attribute magic, as its attributes have completely changed and is now vulnerable to the force of sanctity.

name: Kru
episode:
Form : Devil

An unknown figure that serves Lord Pirate. It has accompanied Lord Pirate in his adventures in the sea, pillaging the people, but now it spends most of its energy pestering the Bellflower Roots under the command of Lord Pirate.

name: Site
notes: Frequently known as "Saitie" or "Cyti" in other game versions. In Fantasia, it is named "Site".
episode:
Form : Immortal

Old alchemist bachelors in Magatia who devote their entire life to research without setting any personal time aside become this monster after life. They are irritable, and have a tendency to angrily throw beakers at anyone they see.

name: Klock
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The confusion in time as a result of the Temporal Schism has affected the clocks in Ludibrium. The Klock became a monster when an evil force consumed its spirit during the Temporal Schism.

name: Tauromacis
drops: Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that guards the Sanctuary in the Sleepywood Dungeon, located in central Victoria Island. It is a warrior that has the head of an ox and the body of a human, and uses a crescent-shaped spear to generate a lightning to destroy everything nearby. It dashes towards its enemy at a high speed with its lethal lightning attack, so you should never hastily approach this monster. It blocks the naive travellers from entering the cursed Sanctuary. It is said that Tauromacis serves as an usher to the Sanctuary to pay for its past crime. However it remains unknown what crime it committed and from whom the punishment is coming from.

name: Yellow King Goblin
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A King Goblin known to fear just about everything including loud noise. It has even lost its goblin bat when the cracking noise of a hazelnut scared it to death. Although a coward, it can burn everything in flames using its big goblin bat. It likes pork.

name: Blue King Goblin
drops: Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for Accuracy 60%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. -50% Ice Attribute Damage.

A King Goblin known for its amnesia that results in forgetting and losing just about everything. It has even lost its hat. Although a forgetful goblin, it can  when the cracking noise of a hazelnut scared it to death. Although a coward, it can freeze everything near by using its big goblin bat. It likes rice wine.

name: Green King Goblin
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks.

King Goblin known for its penchant for wrestling. It frequently pleads with the passersby for a wrestling match.  It can fumigate everything nearby with its infamous flatulence. It likes buckwheat jelly.

name: Rash
episode:
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A fuzzy spirit that lives only in Minar Forest. It cannot be found elsewhere, as it only lives in an area where no signs of contamination can be seen. Many adventurers are fooled by its fuzzy fur and adorable appearance, but it is covered in dust which has anesthetic effects.

name: Captain
episode:
Form : Devil

An unidentifiable monster who serves Lord Pirate. It is one rank superior to Kru, and contributes to pillaging the humans while sailing the sea. Now, it spends most of its energy pestering the Bellflower Roots under the command of Lord Pirate.

name: Cerebes
episode:
Form : Mammal

A monster born in an ocean of lava in a cave. With its reddish eyes, monstrous teeth, and spiky collar, Cerebes threatens its enemies although it only  uses melee attacks. When Cerebes evolves into Bain, however, it will use powerful attacks of fire attribute, so beware.

name: Beetle
drops: Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for Accuracy 10%
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A big beetle that lives in Minar Forest, where trees and leaves are abundant. It is protected by a thick outer layer that minimizes the external impact, and the sizable horn it sports on its head can to toss any threatening enemy far away.

name: Hobi
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 100%
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for Accuracy 100%
Scroll for Two-handed Axe for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A dwarf spirit that lives in Minar Forest. It has an ugly face but even an uglier personality, so you must be cautious when approaching this monster. It steals from people, but cannot figure out how or for what the belongings are used. It is always in raggedy clothes, and an unconfirmed rumor has it that Hobi was banished from the town after committing a crime that turned this monster into a useless, heinous creature. Once a Halfling, the Hobis are not particularly fond of the Halflings.

name: Commander Skeleton
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 60%
episode:
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks.

The skeleton of a Sharenian commander which was brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. After the fall of the Sharenian empire, the skeleton of the commander was revived, devoid of its soul.

name: Lucida
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

Creature living on the Stairway to the Sky, Lucida seems to resemble a black-furred devil. At first glance, it may look a lot like monsters made of Sanctity Attributes, such as Cellion, Lioner and Grupin, but Lucida is apparently a strong opponent against Poison Attacks, although it is vulnerable to Sanctity Attacks. Lucida seems so evil, going within a certain distance around Lucida seems to create sensations of evil right away, so be careful not to go hunting for Lucida without being amply prepared! It is a wonder if Lucida has always been so evil, though...

name: Homunculus
episode:
Form : Enchanted

It is neither a mammal nor a plant, These strange forms of life co-exist although they are completely independent of each other, unlike the relationship that a crocodile and a plover bird share. Researchers seemed to have created these mysterious creatures to study a co-independent couple of organism that are of one entity.

name: Buffoon
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

The monsters who worked the operation room of the Clocktower in Ludibrium. Due to the Dimensional Schism, the souls of these workers were consumed by the force of darkness, turning them into buffoons of time. They attack the lost adventurers with the huge wall clock, which was used to keep time at the Clocktower.

name: Dark Rash
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 100%
Scroll for Overall Armor for DEF 10%
Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 10%
episode:
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A fuzzy spirit that lives only in Minar Forest. Unlike Rash, the creature from which the Dark Rash has evolved, it can be found in contaminated areas as well. The Dark Rash is even more harmful and dangerous than the regular Rash, as its body is covered in dust that has damning effects.

name: Werewolf
episode:
Form : Mammal

A monster that appears in the form of a wolf in the very deep end of the valley in the snowfield. It walks on two feet like a human, but attacks with sharp claws that remain hidden until provoked. There is a rumor that a person who gets bitten by this monster turns into a Werewolf.

name: Taurospear
drops: Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for Accuracy 10%
Scroll for Two-handed Axe for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A monster that guards the Sanctuary in the Sleepywood Dungeon, located in central Victoria Island. It dashes towards the adventurers with a huge spear, and has extremely high defense and attack rate. Furthermore, it moves at a impressively high speed, which renders this monster a bigger challenge than the Jr. Balrog to some adventurers. It guards the entrance of the cursed Sanctuary to prevent adventurers from entering. Although there is a rumor that it became the gate keeper as a punishment for a crime it has committed, but no one knows what the crime was or by whom this monster is being punished.

name: Extra D
episode:
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire, Holy, and Ice Attribute Attacks.

This young and dangerous girl lost her parents when she was a child, and was left wandering the back alleys of Showa Town. She was taken in by The Boss of the Flaming Raccoon. After that, she started to learn the techniques of surviving in the dark world. Some villagers saw her interacting with Umi, owner of the Wild Vegetable shop in Showa Town, and people wondered whether the orphan had formed a special relationship with the kind lady.

name: Leader A
episode:
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison and Fire Attribute Attacks.

One of the enforcers of the Flaming Raccoon Finance, he is a leader of the Extras of the criminal clan in Showa Town. He is a swordsman from one of the Japanese islands, and the wound on his face seems to have come from a duel with another swordsman. His dress is a bit extravagant, giving off a showy attidude.

name: Leader B
episode:
Form : Human
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison and Fire Attribute Attacks.

This tyrant is one of the enforcers of Flaming Raccoon Finance, and shows excellent marksmanship. He spend money like water, and likes to gamble. He wears only a jacket and sandals all the year round, which looks very cold.

name: Slimy
drops: Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Holy Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Electricity Attribute Attacks.

Slimy is the lowest ranked of the ghostly sailors aboard the Ghost Ship, charged with the task of cleaning the ship. It wears a sad expression on its face because of its long and fruitless job, and can also be found outside the ship.

name: Mr. Anchor
episode:
Form : Devil

Mr. Anchor is the second most powerful of the ghostly sailors aboard the Ghost Ship, preceded only by the Capt. Latanica. It can be found carrying an anchor around with a grin, although its eyes were said to be filled with fury.

name: Windraider
notes: Drops "Windraider Badge" despite not being listed.
episode:
Form : Enchanted

One of the strange soldiers of the Corrupted Army that Jack Barricade documented whilst exploring the Crimsonwood Keep. It seems to mimic the tactics of the ancient Windreavers, but without finesse. It uses a crossbow and strange magics to deliver very powerful attacks on anyone who gets too close.

name: Dark Klock
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 60%
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for Accuracy 100%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

The confusion in time as a result of the Temporal Schism has affected the clocks in Ludibrium. The Klock became a monster when an evil force consumed its spirit during the Temporal Schism. This monster is an evolved form of Klock, which has acquired even strong force of darkness.

name: Dual Beetle
drops: Scroll for Two-handed Axe for ATT 60%
Scroll for Cape for Magic Def. 10%
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A big beetle that lives in Minar Forest which acquired a steel-like firm, silver outer layer when it underwent ecdysis. It threatens its enemies with even more powerful attack than a regular Beetle.

name: Green Hobi
drops: Scroll for Wand for Magic Att. 60%
notes: Spawns vines that remain on the map for a set time. Vines seem to have around 9000 HP and are weak to fire.
episode:
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A dwarf spirit that lives in Minar Forest. As the lead warrior of the Hobis, the Green Hobi is in a more fashionable attire, though not by much. Although it displays battle prowess, handling objects isn't a forte for this monster, much like a regular Hobi. The Halflings despise this monster, for it likes to attack their town and steal whatever it can get its hands on.

name: Deep Buffoon
drops: Scroll for Overall Armor for STR 10%
Scroll for Two-handed Sword for ATT 60%
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for Accuracy 10%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

The monsters who worked the operation room of the Clocktower in Ludibrium. Due to the Dimensional Schism, the souls of these workers were consumed by the force of darkness, turning them into buffoons of time. They attack the lost adventurers with the huge wall clock, which was used to keep time at the Clocktower. Every time the Deep Buffoons shake the wall clock, the time is penetrated and fractured.

name: Yeti and Pepe
drops: Scroll for Staff for Magic Att. 10%
Scroll for Cape for Weapon Def. 10%
Scroll for Two-handed Axe for ATT 60%
notes: Separated Pepe gives 420 EXP and Separated Yeti gives 455 EXP.
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

An odd couple found in the snowfield far from El Nath. Even a serious adventurer would find Yeti and Pepe strange yet hilarious, as they nonchalantly roam the snowfield. Many researchers have sought to discover the origination of this phenomenon for a number of years, but no one has found any evidential basis that can support this anomaly. In any case, the phrase ‘as close as Yeti and Pepe’ was coined based on what people have witnessed.

name: Hankie
drops: Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 60%
episode:
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A group of spirits that live in Minar Forest. Unlike their rugged appearance, their personality is rather bubbly and cheerful. They have the ability to out-jump a human by about 1.5 times, which allows them to distract the adventurers by bouncing around. Although they are said to have different colored eye on each side, it is hard to tell by their tiny pupils. They cannot carry a tune even if their lives depended on it, so when you hear Hankie screaming, you will undergo a temporary stun status.

name: Lycanthrope
notes: Able to summon one Werewolf.
episode:
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a giant wolf, occasionally found deep inside the valley of the snowfield. It walks on two feet like a human, and attacks with its sharp claws. Furthermore, it has high defense rate against physical and magic attacks, not to mention its ability to summon Werewolves when it finds itself at a disadvantageous situation. It is resistant against cold air but vulnerable to fire, so it would be wise to attack with fire attribute when hunting Lycanthrope.

name: Harp
drops: Scroll for Cape for Weapon Def. 10%
episode:
Form : Bird
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A bird-like monster with a long tail. It has a ravishing blue tail and a lovely voice that complements its beauty; however, it seduces people in order to lower their Accuracy, putting them in danger.

name: Dark Yeti and Pepe
notes: Separated Dark Pepe gives 700 EXP and Separated Dark Yeti gives 715 EXP.

name: Ghost Pirate
drops: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for Accuracy 100%
Scroll for Cape for Magic Def. 60%
Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 10%
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Ghost Pirate is one of them. The Ghost Pirate rides a flying boat that has a huge clock, allowing this monster to find its ways even through the Temporal Schism and pillage the lost adventurers. It is said that the Ghost Pirate is highly resistant to attacks of coldness attribute although it is terrified of fire attacks, for fire could easily burn its ship in flames.

name: Blood Harp
drops: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for Accuracy 100%
episode:
Form : Bird
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A bird-like monster with a long tail. It has a ravishing reddish tail and a lovely voice that complements its beauty; however, it seduces people in order to lower their Accuracy, putting them in danger.

name: Death Teddy
episode:
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as the Soul Teddy's source of hatred and subsequent attack. The original form of the teddy has been consumed and distorted by the force, leaving only the creature that controls the teddy as its only recognizable physical feature.

As one of the most powerful pirate monster, its ship has a powerful propeller that can penetrate the gap in time. Although highly resistant against attacks of coldness attribute, it fears fire, for fire can burn its ship in flames.

It belongs to a group of warriors that have fought against each other for a long time just to prove their strength. It possesses the power of fire attribute and fears attacks of coldness attribute. The Black Kentaurus has the force of darkness, which explains its fear of attacks of sanctity attribute.

The creatures appear to be robotic in nature, and are confusingly called Spiders by the locals, despite only having six legs. Their origin remains a mystery, but what is well documented is their impressive strength. They attack in swarms, overwhelming even the bravest adventurer. Many a brave souls have fallen victim to these terrible machines.

According to Winston, who has devoted a good chunk of his life to studying the plateaus of Perion, Perion in ancient times was not a dry and barren land. Rather, he suggests that it was a place of which bountiful forests rivaled those of current Ellinia. The soil in Perion had been saturated with moisture and nutrients in the past, supporting the necessary conditions for huge plants like Stumpy to grow. However, it has turned into a dry land, and Stumpy, which can be considered a legacy of ancient Perion, now survives on what, little, is left of the barren land.

An evil monster of the dragon family that lives in Manon's Forest. It is considered a high-ranking dragon, boasting various magic skills as well as high level of intelligence. Its physical strength also contributes to the challenge for adventurers battling against this monster, as it is covered by a firm outer layer and has a breath that can melt even the toughest metals. It can also fly using its small wings. The Manons had an amicable relationship with the Halflings, but for an unknown reason, they have become hostile towards one another.

A strange race of creatures that live in Griffey Forest. They have a body of a unicorn, eagle's wings, and the tail of a lion. They rival the strength of the dignified dragons, and they have set their nests in Leafre, which is considered to be the land of the dragons. As a race of high intelligence level and respect, the Griffeys, according to a legend, are said to be loyal to heroes.

episode:
Form : Enchanted

A monster from another world which landed here as a result of the Dimensional Schism. It may have numerous personalities, but all of those personalities are uniformly evil, having contributed to the progression of the Dimensional Schism with the force of Ludibrium, not to mention how it's turned all the toys of Ludibrium into monsters. They say that Papulatus is increasingly endowed with more and more power from the forces of the other world as the Dimensional Schism grows larger and larger over time.

name: Zakum3
episode:
Form : Devil

A dormant spirit of the Zakum tree which previously was without any intellect. The tree started to show signs of life while being fueled by the passion-filled energy of the residents of the lava region. The lava region has been known to have survived by only the passions of its residents in the midst of all the darkness, burning flames and heat surrounding the region. Apparently the dark and shady emotions of the humans living in the area have somehow been absorbed by Zakum over time. Zakum used to be a small, neglected tree, but has now grown powerful thanks to the energy of the human residents of the lava region, who have harbored a great force that even exceeds that of humans...

name: Horntail
episode:
Form : Reptile

The first dragon that's ever stood up against the dragon chief, Nine Spirit, who was the former ruler over Minar Forest. Horntail assembled an army of evil dragons to create an evil force that instigated the historically-known Dragon War. Horntail seemed to be the more powerful one at the beginning, but Nine Spirit's longstanding experience and wisdom as a leader seemed to overpower Horntail's inexperience. In the end, Horntail broke the Pact between the dragons and Halflings and attacked the Halflings' village, stealing the egg of Nine Spirit which they were protecting. This was a crime that no dragon known as the guardian of order should have committed. Ultimately, Horntail overthrew the reign of Nine Spirit, and the forest was conquered by the demonic servants of Horntail. Since then, no traces of true, honorable dragons could be found in the forest. Horntail, who has three heads and, subsequently, three different minds, is currently hiding in a cave to heal his wounds, and plotting to rule the regions even past Leafre using the egg of Nine Spirit.
